name: Anse La Farine Jetty: Boards That Remember
scene: 7 gaps, 1 post, 2 floats. A corked bottle beneath boards.
riddle: Where something is missing, something is hidden.

renderSpec.prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card of 7 gaps, 1 post, 2 floats. A corked bottle beneath boards.. weathered_jetty_hidden_secrets with weathered_wood_rope_texture. Dense foliage, rhythmic Seychellois motifs, saturated greens/blues/yellows. background_lagoon_midground_jetty_foreground_bottle. Fine copperplate hatching, visible brush strokes, textured overlays. Cultural stamps: traditional_jetty_construction, fishing_gear. Volumetric depth, painterly effects, living busy scene. Etched-map caption strip with gold title. 17th-century nautical chart + Seychellois modernist painting, ritualistic archaeological mood.
